 2024-10472024-09-20ESDC
ActPoverty Reduction Act
PrecisReappointment of SCOTT THOMAS LEE MACAFEE of Hanwell, New Brunswick, as Chairperson of the National Advisory Council on Poverty, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective October 1, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of SCOTT THOMAS LEE MACAFEE of Hanwell, New Brunswick, as Chairperson of the National Advisory Council on Poverty, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective October 1, 2024.
